raw.title: [ARFC] Onboard USDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
Title: [ARFC] Onboard USDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum 
Date: 2024-05-13
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
---

### Summary:

This is an ARFC to seek approval for the addition of USDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum, as there’s been already a successful onboarding for sUSDe (staked USDe)  on Ethereum.

### **Motivation**

Ethena’s synthetic dollar, USDe, provides a stable crypto-native solution for a cash and carry structured product. The staked version of USDe, sUSDe, earns yield from the protocol and has high potential for strong borrow demand, which was already onboarded successfully into Aave. 

The current ARFC plans to onboard USDe on Aave v3 Ethereum.

### **Specification**

USDe: (0x4c9edd5852cd905f086c759e8383e09bff1e68b3)
[Etherscan link](https://etherscan.io/token/0x4c9edd5852cd905f086c759e8383e09bff1e68b3)

### Risk Parameters

ARFC has been updated with Risk parameters provided by Risk Service Providers in the ARFC discussion thread.

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | Yes |
| Borrowable | Yes |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (USDe) | 80M |
| Borrow Cap (USDe) | 72M |
| UOptimal | 80% |
| Slope1 | 9.00% |
| Slope2 | 75.00% |
| Debt Ceiling | $40M |
| LTV | 72.00% |
| LT | 75.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 8.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00% |

### **Useful Links**

[[TEMP CHECK] Onboard sUSDe to Aave v3 Ethereum](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/16840)

[[ARFC] Onboard sUDe to Aave v3 on Ethereum](https://governance.aave.com/t/arfc-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/17191/6)

### Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Ethena and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

### **Next Steps**

1. Collect community & service providers feedback on this ARFC.
2. Escalate the proposal to ARFC snapshot stage if feedback is positive.
3. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived under [CCO](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

raw.body:
---
### [ARFC]  Onboard sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum 

### Author:  ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

### Date: 2024-04-01

---

### **Summary**

This is an ARFC to seek approval for the addition of sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum, following the consensus reached in the [TEMP CHECK](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x3263dbee34f5afe513a1a6c5bcd5207684cee03473e1b3d7616993dbd87ab881) stage.

### **Motivation**

As discussed in the TEMP CHECK, Ethena's synthetic dollar, USDe, provides a stable crypto-native solution for a cash and carry structured product. The staked version of USDe, sUSDe, earns yield from the protocol and has high potential for strong borrow demand. 

### **Specification**

sUSDe: [0x9d39a5de30e57443bff2a8307a4256c8797a3497](https://etherscan.io/token/0x9d39a5de30e57443bff2a8307a4256c8797a3497)

### Risk Parameters

Risk parameters have been provided by Chaos Labs in the ARFC discussion thread. 

Initial Risk Parameters are the following:

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | Yes |
| Borrowable | No |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (sUSDe) | 85M |
| Debt Ceiling |40M |
| LTV | 72.00% |
| LT | 75.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 8.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00%|
|Flashloanable|No|
|Siloed Borrowing|No|
|Borrowed in Isolation|No|
|Emode|No|

### **Useful Links**

[TEMP CHECK](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/16840)
[TEMP CHECK Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x3263dbee34f5afe513a1a6c5bcd5207684cee03473e1b3d7616993dbd87ab881)

### Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Ethena and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

### **Next Steps**

1. Collect community & service providers feedback on this ARFC.
2. Escalate the proposal to ARFC snapshot stage if feedback is positive.
3. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [ARFC] Onboard BNBx to Aave V3 BNB Chain
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-05-27

---

### **Summary**
This ARFC proposes the addition of BNBx from Stader to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

BNBx is a liquid staked token of BNB from Stader. Users can freely mint BNBx in exchange for BNB deposits and earn yield from staking.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract address: [0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275](https://bscscan.com/token/0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275)

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | No |
| Borrowable | Yes |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (BNBx) | 5,000 |
| Borrow Cap (BNBx) | 500 |
| Debt Ceiling | NA |
| LTV | 65.00% |
| LT | 70.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 7.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00% |
| Variable Base | 0.0% |
| Variable Slope1 | 7.00% |
| Variable Slope2 | 300.00% |
| Uoptimal | 45.00% |
| Reserve Factor | 15.00% |
| Stable Borrowing | Disabled |
| Flahloanable  | Yes |
| Siloed Borrowing | No |
| Borrowed in Isolation | No |

Risk Parameters have been provided by Risk Service Providers and ARFC has been updated.

## **Useful Links**

- Website: https://www.staderlabs.com/
- BNBx docs: https://binance.docs.staderlabs.com/
- [TEMP CHECK](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-bnbx-on-aave-v3-bnb-chain/16850)
- [TEMP CHECK Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x9510ea1d3c9fd0f1fd67b05860ca2f1dafb65b983ff1f81d962b7dea0c47b13b)

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this ARFC on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
2. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
## [ARFC] Onboard slisBNB to Aave V3 on BNB Chain
## Author: ACI
## Date: 2024-07-25
---
Risk Parameters have been updated after Risk Service Providers feedback 2024-07-29

### Summary
This proposal seeks to onboard slisBNB, a tokenized version of staked BNB introduced by Lista DAO, to Aave V3 on the BNB Chain.

### **Motivation**

slisBNB is a Liquid Staking Token (LST) from ListaDAO, which aims to bring additional liquidity and utility to staked BNB. The token allows users to participate in the staking rewards while maintaining the flexibility to use their staked assets within the DeFi ecosystem.

Onboarding slisBNB will allow Aave users to utilize it as collateral, thus broadening the asset base and enhancing overall liquidity.

### Proof of Liquidity and Deposit Commitments

Users who supply slisBNB liquidity on Aave, will be eligible to get stardust (points) from Lista's ongoing point system Cosmic Adventure Challenge Season 3, which will turn to LISTA token airdrop when Season 3 ends.

### Specification

Token Name: slisBNB

Underlying Asset: Staked BNB

Contract: 0xB0b84D294e0C75A6abe60171b70edEb2EFd14A1B

> Risk Parameters and analysis have been provided by Risk Service Providers so ARFC has been be updated accordingly.

|Parameter|Value|
|---|---|
|Isolation Mode|No|
|Borrowable|Yes|
|Borrowable in Isolation|No|
|Collateral Enabled|Yes|
|E-Mode Category|None|
|Supply Cap|20,000|
|Borrow Cap|2,000|
|Debt Ceiling|-|
|LTV|55%|
|LT|60%|
|Liquidation Bonus|7.50%|
|Liquidation Protocol Fee|10.00%|
|Variable Base|0.0%|
|Variable Slope1|7.00%|
|Variable Slope2|300.00%|
|Uoptimal|45.00%|
|Reserve Factor|15.00%|
|Stable Borrowing|Disabled|
|Flashloanable|Yes|
|Siloed Borrowing|No|


### **Useful Links:**

https://lista.org/

https://lista.org/liquid-staking/BNB

### Disclaimer:

This proposal is powered by Skywards. ACI is not directly affiliated with Lista DAO and did not receive compensation for creating this proposal.

### Next Steps

1. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage.
2. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### Copyright:

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

raw.title: [ARFC] Onboard USDC.e to Aave V3 Gnosis Chain
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [ARFC] Onboard USDC.e to Aave V3 Gnosis Chain 
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-06-11

---

# **Summary**
This proposal aims to onboard USDC.e into the Aave V3 pools on Gnosis.

## Motivation

Gnosis will be deploying a new version of USDC, following the Bridge Token Standard. The migration from the older version of USDC allows for more flexibility and paves the way for deeper integration with Circle and native USDC implementations.

This proposal aims to onboard USDC.e into the Aave V3 pools on Gnosis in support of this migration, allowing Aave users to transition to the new version of USDC.

## Specification

Token Symbol: USDC.e

Address:

Chainlink oracle:

Minter Allowance Transmuter:

https://gnosisscan.io/address/0x2a22f9c3b484c3629090feed35f17ff8f88f76f0#readProxyContract#F15

### Risk Parameters:

Risk Parameters have been provided by Risk Service Providers and this ARFC has been updated accordingly.

|Risk Parameter|Value|
|---|---|
|Isolation Mode|No|
|Borrowable in Isolation|Yes|
|Stable Borrow|No|
|Enable Borrow|Yes|
|Enable Collateral|Yes|
|Loan To Value (LTV)|75%|
|Liquidation Threshold|78%|
|Liquidation Bonus|5%|
|Reserve Factor|10%|
|Liquidation Protocol Fee|10%|
|Supply Cap||
|Borrow Cap||
|Debt Ceiling|N/A|
|Optimal|90%|
|Base|0%|
|Slope1|9%|
|Slope2|75%|

## Potential Incentives

To facilitate a seamless transition to the new version of USDC.e, relevant foundations, DAO & Circle, are welcome to propose incentive programs.

After the publication of this ARFC, relevant foundations such as DAO & Circle, may propose incentive programs. If that’s the situation, this proposal will be updated accordingly. 

The ACI, via the Skyward program, will prepare the AIP implementation accordingly.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [ARFC], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

## Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative (ACI) is not compensated in any form by Gnosis Chain, Circle or any affiliated entities for creating this ARFC proposal.

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

decision.summary: Proposal to remove FRAX from isolation mode and onboard sFRAX to Aave v3 Mainnet with CAPO risk parameters similar to DAI. Supported by strong early voting lead and stable timeline metrics. Forum sentiment is cautiously supportive with no strong opposition. Market reactions during event window are positive, indicating community and market approval. Lessons from similar asset onboarding proposals highlight importance of strict parameterization and monitoring, which this proposal incorporates.
key_arguments_for: Unanimous early and stable lead for YAE option in voting timeline.
Forum comments mostly neutral or cautiously supportive with expert endorsements.
Positive price (+8.83%) and TVL (+1.96%) changes during event window.
Strict risk parameters and CAPO recommendations mitigate potential risks.
Proposal enhances ecosystem flexibility and collateral options by removing isolation mode.
key_arguments_against: Forum sentiment includes some negative comments highlighting operational risks and centralized dependencies in Frax protocol.
sFRAX contracts are unaudited with opaque off-chain yield sources.
Regulatory and governance risks due to off-chain control and lack of full on-chain governance implementation.
Lessons from similar proposals show risk of negative market response if parameters are not carefully set.

evidence.quote: Forum contains mixed but mostly cautious support comments. First post detailed proposal description with some negative sentiment; expert posts endorse proposal with risk mitigations.
Lead ratio total 1.0 for YAE, stability 1.0, early ratio 1.0, indicating dominant and consistent support.
Positive price change of +8.83% and TVL increase of +1.96% concurrent with proposal event.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- The voting timeline metrics show a unanimous and stable lead for the YAE option, indicating strong support throughout the voting period.
- Forum discussion sentiment is cautiously positive with endorsements from risk experts and no strong opposition, supporting the vote outcome.
- Positive market reactions during the event window reinforce confidence in the proposal’s beneficial impact.
- Lessons from similar past proposals emphasize the importance of strict risk parameters, which this proposal implements, thereby balancing growth with risk mitigation.
- The recommendation aligns with forum sentiment, reinforcing that the vote reflects community views and strategic interests.
